item1.content: At first, let's take a short look at what polish language is. As you may know, it's a western Slavic language, used by almost 70 million people all around the world, including almost 38 million citizens. As you can see, there are plenty of people who speak this language. And I am really glad you want to learn polish too üòÅ.
